These labels were clearly not ordered by me or anyone here at Browne Trading Co,  What do you want done with them?

Review.Titre: All was great except I thought I could…
Review.Contenu: All was great except I thought I could purchase premade cookies through you and then was told they’d send me the vendor. Vendors of the premade cookies never sent and then I called again and your company person told me they couldn’t share the vendor for the cookies information.I feel a bit angry about this as I was relying on the purchase of cookies

Review.Titre: I had a lot of trouble trying to order…
Review.Contenu: I had a lot of trouble trying to order a product on the website. The main problem was a shipping quote not able to be calculated after entering my address multiple times.  The sales rep I called was very helpful and was able to process my order very quickly, though.

Review.Titre: I am a new Primara customer
Review.Contenu: I am a new Primara customer.  I purchased two bottle labelers one for round and one for square bottles. The round one worked as advertised. The other required specially printed labels. I have emailed customer service several times to allow a 60 return policy on the square bottle labeler. I have not heard from them despite the fact that the salesman who sold me the labelers said I would hear from them soon. As I am right up against their return policy I don’t know how to proceed. Customer service could be improved.

Review.Titre: Beware of ETA for Bo items
Review.Contenu: I purchased a machine 7 weeks ago and still no news about when we will get it.Thank you Primera for this explanation, this could have been disclosed right from the beginning as this might have influenced our decisions and for sure our expectations.

Review.Titre: meh?
Review.Contenu: meh?I have both an LX500 and an LX610 and the 610 has been nothing but problems since the start. First one I received was defective out of the box and its replacement had to be sent in for warranty repair after two months of relatively light use. Two days after receiving it back it was already having issues. Tech support got me up and running for the rest of that day(software issue) but it failed again the next. Rating a 3 because my 500 has been wonderful, unfortunately I completely regret the purchase of the more expensive printer at this point.

Review.Titre: The supplies I purchased were described…
Review.Contenu: The supplies I purchased were described as matte white...what I received was off white almost parchment color. Returned the two rolls after chatting online with a customer service representative. The following week Primera shipped back one of the rolls of the off white back to me. ???? Still have not received a credit or an exchange. Very disappointed to have wasted $$$.

Review.Titre: When lined up it works very well
Review.Contenu: When lined up it works very well.  The issue is keeping it lined up.  We're losing 17 bottles per 500 plus the time lost to stop and realign the machine.  This happens in the beginning of a roll and repeatedly during the last third of a roll.  While advertising 1,200 labels per hour, with all the stop and starts, we have averaged 350 per hour.

Review.Titre: We order The same custom labels a…
Review.Contenu: We order The same custom labels a couple of times a year. it would be nice to save the settings, so we do not  have to reinvent the wheel each time.I adjusted my review after the company contacted me directly, stating that they are in the process of up dating the their ordering system to store custom label part numbers. once I see how well it works I will system up date this review.

Review.Titre: Don’t waste your time with a refurbished printer
Review.Contenu: I bought a refurbished printer, it came defective. Primera had a brand new printer at my door with-in the week. Excellent, receptive customer service.The new printer I received was also defective. I was offered a brand new printer, after not receiving a shipping label for the old one. At this point I had already purchased a new printer, I would not suggest buying a refurbished unit from them.

Review.Titre: Quote from email on 4/19/22 was for…
Review.Contenu: Quote from email on 4/19/22 was for 300.00 plus tax. Invoice came and it was350.00 plus tax. Not sure what the extra 50.00 was for?Primera had a price increase but they honored the quote for 300.00 issue resolved.

Review.Titre: We received the parts in a timely…
Review.Contenu: We received the parts in a timely manner. Thank you. We are a packaging equipment company and are reselling the parts a part of a repair on a AP362.We did not want to pay tax since it was for re-sale. Also no resellers discount?This is the part we are unhappy with. Person that we ordered parts from on the phone was saying Primera does not deal with resale.How do we get set up to sell your parts. We sell many brand label applicators and would like to add your product line to ours.

Review.Titre: Great Tech Support, Bad Product
Review.Contenu: Customer service was polite and helpful despite restrictive company policies.  The product itself is fraught with issues and the money we thought we would save with printing labels ourself was generally wasted in misprints and bad alignment.  Additionally our production was constantly interrupted by device failures and having to send the printers back for repair (even with having two of them).

Review.Titre: The products have been okay :/
Review.Contenu: This is not the first time we received the labels without perforation. I know the rolls of 3" x 2" Extreme Matte BOPP, 750/roll, 2" core SKU: 075891 has them, so it's annoying to know we keep getting the ones that doesn't have it. These labels aren't cheap, and knowing the quality is not what I signed up for is disappointing. However, I do appreciate the on-timed delivery.

Review.Titre: The Customer Service Agents are great...
Review.Contenu: The Customer Service Agents and Tech Support are great. They have always been very helpful. The cost of replacement parts, ouch... If they buy the drives in bulk, they probably pay $50. Then they have a little time flashing in their custom firmware, then they charge $250 for a drive that I have been through 4 of over the life of my Duplicator.

Review.Titre: Looks used not like new
Review.Contenu: We were very excited to receive our AP360 refurbished and was a little disappointed when we took it out of the box and the first thing we notice is that the foot peddle is dirty and the rubber pad on the bottom is pealing away.They were great to respond promptly and replace the peddle. Thank you

Review.Titre: ordering supplies
Review.Contenu: when ordering supplies such as ink cartridges and labels, I have to click thru the supplies and then click on the model I need the supplies for then I can get to the supplies I need. The problem is when I need to order 3 different ink cartridges, after each one I have to repeat all the steps to get back to the supplies for the model I have.  Maybe I am doing something wrong but it seems very cumbersome.

Review.Titre: EXREMEMLY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE FOLLOW UP …
Review.Contenu: placed any order and received a response, confirming that someone would be in touch my us and nothing happened for over a week until I called back asking what was the hold up with my order. Then I found out the hold up was the fact that we pay with credit card and are not on terms ; which should not have mattered. Someone should have called for the information on the card and kept things moving forward. KNOW ONE DID

Review.Titre: AP360 Unit Review
Review.Contenu: The AP360 labeling unit we got us great, but it doesn't fit some of our rolls, for others it has to be set up higher on lifts due to the size, and then finally the used stock roll gets sucked back into the labeler causing it to jam and apply several labels uhh until the unit is shut off.

Review.Titre: I ordered a replacement power supply…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a replacement power supply for Bravo Series 4100 Disc Publisher from Primera. It came with no instructions. Tech support was kind enough to send me the service manual that had instructions for replacing everything BUT the power supply. I tried to replace the power supply but must have done something wrong. Unit still doesn't work.

Review.Titre: Quality Supplier
Review.Contenu: The products are acceptable and I have always been able to get support when I need it. I don't like that I can't get payment terms and order with a purchase order. This makes Primera one of the most cumbersome suppliers I have to deal with. It requires internet orders and credit card payment in addition to purchase orders in my system. If they were easier to order from I would rate them higher.

Review.Titre: The machine sometimes gives me…
Review.Contenu: The machine sometimes gives me problems. I have the Primera 500 series. I wish they had perforated labels for less. It would be nice to print a bunch of labels at a time. I put several label names in at a time and they drop in to a box. Then I have to sort them out. You have to figure out the ideosyncrasies of the machine. Otherwise, you will have problems. Well, I did.

Review.Titre: I have been in business for over 50…
Review.Contenu: I have been in business for over 50 years and have never packaged aproduct that can be easily damaged in a bubble envelope. These kind of products need to be in a box. The money you save isn't worth it if the product gets damaged like the last ink cartridge your Company sent me.I like Primera products just don't like some of the company policies.

Review.Titre: After adding an item to the cart
Review.Contenu: After adding an item to the cart, the website does not return to the page you were on before thus requiring you to click back thru the whole products, ink listing, etc. to get back to the next ink to be added to the cart. In other words, when you click "continue shopping" the last page you were looking at does not come up. This forces you to click thru a bunch of stuff just to get back to what you were trying to order.

Review.Titre: Their printer works great
Review.Contenu: Their printer works great.  We have had many problems with ink cartridges, and labels skip - lots of waste.  Fast shipping is not an option.  I got a defected ink cartridge from here in the middle of the holidays. They could not get me a replacement overnight or even two days, I ordered one on  Amazon and got it overnight.  Customer service is ok and very text book.

Review.Titre: Its okay
Review.Contenu: Its okay. But it does require a LOT of cleaning (nearly) each time before printing. So there is a lot of time wasted and a lot of money wasted on ink, printing tests and trying to clean it. Guess it is nature of ink jets but for the almost $2500 I paid for the printer I guess it should have been laser printer so it wouldn't have that issue? Just my two cents.

Review.Titre: The labels we have been purchasing for…
Review.Contenu: The labels we have been purchasing for the past 5+ years have just doubled in price. It was hard enough for all of us to get through the pandemic. Small businesses that actually made it will be put out of business by people that push pricing through the roof.

Review.Titre: Overall decent product, more costly than advertised to operate
Review.Contenu: Overall I'm satisfied with the print quality, it works just as you'd expect.The ink cartridges are expensive, they can't be refilled, and they don't seem to be actually empty when the printer says that they can't be used anymore.I feel like I'm not getting a good value for the high cost of the ink.The number of labels ruined by misprints or printing errors is far too high and also cuts in to the overall value of the experience.

Review.Titre: This is my 2nd reminder asking me for a…
Review.Contenu: This is my 2nd reminder asking me for a review of my Eddie machine. But I have not received it as of yet, because I am waiting on a coaster machine. I will have to notify my sales rep to see how many coaster orders they have. Thank you

Review.Titre: We paid over 3,000 dollars for this…
Review.Contenu: We paid over 3,000 dollars for this printer to replace our old Primera printer that stopped working. I took about 5 days for this printer to consistently actually work correctly after multiple calls to tech support. We did not do anything differently to get it to start working consistently as we have had this model before and know what we are doing. It works fine now but it was pretty disappointing and frustrating to have to deal with this after spending so much money on this printer. Fingers crossed it continues to work.

Review.Titre: The Primera web site is poor.
Review.Contenu: The Primera Bravo is a good product.  The web site is not. It took nearly half an hour to order a color print cartridge. The cartridge was not easy to find.  Checking out was a long and tedious process. I kept being interrupted by someone trying to chat with with me.

Review.Titre: Ink and labels can sometimes cause misprints
Review.Contenu: I have been experiencing some issues both with ink and labels.  The black ink cartridge is only lasting down to 25% thereby not printing the labels correctly and  creating waste and expense. Also, some of the labels stick to the roll causing misprints. I have contacted customer support regarding the ink cartridge, they have replaced a couple free of charge but lately their response has been to clean the spongy part with alcohol. I did not contact about the sticky labels.

Review.Titre: Ink Is Way To Expensive...
Review.Contenu: Ink Is Way To Expensive If You Are Using This To Make Money It Isn't Worth It. Also The Print Quality Is Ok Could Be Better. You Can See Lines Where The Ink Was Printed And When I Use A CIS Printer There Is 0 Lines And Perfect Quality, Also CIS Is Wayyyyyy Cheaper On Ink. So Its Common Sense Why I'm Selling My Primera Now!

Review.Titre: A refurbished portable printer is…
Review.Contenu: A refurbished portable printer is usually sold the same things it would come with new including a battery. I had to buy the battery separately and discovered that it did not have a battery when it showed up. You should have at least mentioned that it did not come with the battery so I could order one in advance and have a working unit when it got here. I do not know if it is any good because without the battery I cannot test it, so you can understand though I like it generally I am not impressed with your site

Review.Titre: For Bravo 4201 Disc Publisher.
Review.Contenu: For Bravo 4201 Disc Publisher.The reasons for an average rating is do to the proprietary nature of the device. I don't have a problem with most of it. It is mainly the fact that if you order a unit that has one drive and there is a slot available for a second, you should be able add a second drive. My other issue is that it only works with specific drives why not get the customer the option to purchase your awesome printer, but get there own drive. Overall the product works great and support is great.

Review.Titre: Your customer service is lacking
Review.Contenu: Your customer service is lacking. They never reach back out after a problem, I just assume or have to to reach out to you. Your label rolls cut short for printing and there is still an inch left on roll, but they read as empty so I can't use the complete roll. This has happened three times now. Some rolls have tape and have been repaired in the middle of a roll. Last time I called to report a cartridge that would not work, I felt like the man I spoke with was giving me the third degree. I sent it back to you with label you emailed me.  I had to call over a week later to see if you received and were going to send me a replacement out.  When I called they had not sent a replacement, so if I had not called would you have not sent a replacement?Your pop up on website, I had tried to use once when placing an order, they told me to do it on line and not through the pop-up.  Don't have it there then.

Review.Titre: I like the products the only thing i…
Review.Contenu: I like the products the only thing i dislike is when the roll has about 10 labels left it says to change the roll even when it still has labels. I have lost over a roll now with how much i print. It is the LX900

Review.Titre: This review is of the ordering process…
Review.Contenu: This review is of the ordering process only.  The chat feature was useful to address some of my questions, but I'm still curious about how the cookie is held in place during the printing process.  When I ordered, there was inconsistency on whether you had the inventory - the cart image didn't show it was in the cart, so I kept clicking to move forward with the purchase...I was in previously on another day also...  When I finally advanced, the cart showed 3 :)!  It said one would be delayed.  I reduced it to 1 printer and checked out.  After submission, I got the backorder message in email.  You do have a message on the front, but different messaging on the actual order screens.  I was hopeful it would be here before I leave town, now I don't know.  I think the web order screens / cart need to be reviewed.  Hope this helps.

Review.Titre: Great fast turn around time
Review.Contenu: Great fast turn around time on my sent in unit and helpful online tech support. Unfortunately, my issue has still not been resolved. My Bravo 4150 had a power failure and was sent in for a power supply replacement. However, it came back with a new drive that did not work for Dual Layer DVD burning (That's about 90% of my business). They immediately sent out a new replacement drive but, it too, is having issues. It's just frustrating that I sent it in fully functional minus a power supply and get it back with a replaced power supply but now can't perform any of the DVD burning functions that worked fine before.

Review.Titre: Im sure we will love this printer
Review.Contenu: Im sure we will love this printer, however when the first one arrived and yes I said first one because I had to send the first one back because it was received broken. You couldn't see the damage because it was internal. Returning it was bothersome enough but if I wanted a rapid return I had to give them a $1000 dollar hold on my debit card. Wasn't my fault it was received broken but it cost me another $1000 hold for over a week till they got the broken one back. But we got the replacement within a couple days and it does work. I just hate receiving anything broken.

Review.Titre: The color 500 image printed is…
Review.Contenu: The color 500 image printed is excellent, but beware the ink dries out on the print head after a day or so of non use and requires extracting and wiping with alcohol in order to try to clear.The phone support was prompt and informative but curt and not particularly friendly.

Review.Titre: Replacement Parts inventory
Review.Contenu: When calling in for repair parts the option to get refurb. parts is great, but when you are out of stock on the refurb. part there is no referral to buy the new parts that are in stock.  Overall the tech. department is very knowledgeable and answered all other question.

Review.Titre: The Lx500 has a piece of rubber plastic…
Review.Contenu: The Lx500 has a piece of rubber plastic they call a wiper then wears out very fast and you cannot print finished labels without it working properly. You end up wasting labels and ink because of poor quality of printed labels. Primera needs to fix this constant problem with this wiper. Also the ink for this machine is outrageously priced at $50-60. There are no cheaper versions to purchase so you are trapped into buying this ink at the price they set. They also never give any promos or discounts on ink at any time. It is a very large money maker for them probably more then the printer itself over the life of the unit.

Review.Titre: Tech Support hustled to get repair don, BUT
Review.Contenu: Tech Support hustled to get repair done quickly, which was great.  Upon receipt, a vital part was missing--Tech Support found it, but then it took another week for its delivery, thereby wiping out all the good value from the initial early turnaround

Review.Titre: Sent our printer in for repair
Review.Contenu: Sent our printer in for repair. Called a number of times on the condition of repair but no response. I believe that customers should have a detail report of what is fixed during a repair. For the reason that a customer may avoid future repairs if necessary.

Review.Titre: They used to be excellent-now I'm switching to Kiaro
Review.Contenu: Their chat support is excellent whereas their phone support is mainly handled by rude people who do the bare minimum to assist. To make matters worse, they have discontinued printers...like the LX900, even though the purchase came with a lifetime service warranty, they have "discontinued" all support for the main components....It's a lawsuit waiting to happen.I love the ease of the printer and its components, and used to love everything about this company except the phone support, but with all the new changes that help the company and hurt their customers, my next printer purchase will be a Kiaro.

Review.Titre: The customer service over the phone was…
Review.Contenu: The customer service over the phone was wonderful,  delivery was expected on one day and it took a couple days after that because my machine ended up in a different state  but that was probably due to the delivery service,  The guy I got for the free one hour was not very helpful he talked fast he seemed irritated when I would ask him questions he ran through things so fast and would not explain a whole lot and I told him I was not computer savvy at all and to be patient and explain,  my daughter was even with me and she could not keep up with him we gave up and stopped taking Notes because he was going way too fast and he was sighing a few times like I was bothering him, So I’ve been trying to learn on my own but there’s so many things I cannot figure out ☹️☹️☹️☹️

Review.Titre: Website riddled with problems creating…
Review.Contenu: Website riddled with problems creating accounts and ordering materials (shipping vs billing address was totally confusing as the buttons switched back and forth so both were always the same when attempting to enter a shipping addesss, buttons below should be removed as they don't work.   Figured out  you have to ignore this and add a new address that they allows you to assign it to a billing or shipping  address and this works.spend some money to getting your  online orders working properly, many would have given up and just bought from Amazon that was actually cheaper by $300 than your website, but the lead time was one additional week and I needed it here quicker than 3 weeks..

Review.Titre: I RECEIVED THE PRINTER BUT IT DID NOT…
Review.Contenu: I RECEIVED THE PRINTER BUT IT DID NOT RECOGNIZED THE CARTRIDGE AT FIRST, I TRIED SEVERAL INTENTS, PHONE CALLS AND FINALLY I GOT IT TO WORK, BUT NOW IT SEEMS I NEED TO PURCHASE AN EXTRA PROGRAM TO USE MY PRINTER TO THE FULLEST, THIS WAS NEVER MENTIONED TO ME BY THE SALES DEPARTMENT AND I FEEL THAT IS A DOWN SIDE OF THE COMPANY. ALSO I WAS SUGGESTED TO BUY THE MATTE PAPER FOR A BETTER WATER RESISTANT RESULT IN PRINTING BUT AGAIN THIS IS NOT THE PAPER I NEEDED FOR MY JUICE LABELS, I NEEDED SATIN OR GLOSS INSTEAD. AN OVERAL AVERAGE EXPERIENCE IS WHAT I GOT IN TERMS OF GETTING STARTED THE PRINTER AND NOT WELL INFORMED OF EXTRA INVESTMENT of 150.00 TO MAXIMIZE THE USE OF THE PRINTER, AND THE WRONG PAPER I NEEDED TO GET MY LABELS GOING...

Review.Titre: Have had issues since 1st received
Review.Contenu: Have had issues since 1st received - think that you should have someone to walk you through install and explain everything to you the 1st time.Still trying to figure it all out - tech support is very helpful though

Review.Titre: Wasting labels
Review.Contenu: Its Horrible that 15-18 labels at the end of the roll don't get used every time. Plus every time you turn the printer on/off it will skip and waste 3 more labels. Over time that is a TON of UNNECCESARY waste.

Review.Titre: Exciting day for such a big purchase
Review.Contenu: Exciting day for such a big purchase! I only wish the customer service representatives were a little more kind and understanding. World class customer service goes a long way!

Review.Titre: For Primera to be such  a major…
Review.Contenu: For Primera to be such  a major supplier in the printer market I would think you would have one of the best fulfillment centers. Your delivery times are prohibitive to us who use your machines. Labels ,supplies ETC......

Lx2000 nice printer with the exception that printing in color is very very slow.  In this industry 1000’s of Labels are crazy at once and when it takes multiple hours that becomes an issue. Maybe it’s time to upgrade

Review.Titre: I actually would like to thank you for…
Review.Contenu: I actually would like to thank you for your efficient and professional service. You serviced my machine and it came back it good working order thanx

Review.Titre: I've used them for a number years and…
Review.Contenu: I've used them for a number years and ever time there is one glitch or other, it usually takes several tries to get an order placed.  Annoying on a Friday afternoon late when you want to get out.

Review.Titre: We have been trying to connect…
Review.Contenu: We have been trying to connect personally with a rep and have a ticket number, but I finally just went online to purchase, and the website is a little tricky to navigate (i/e having a different billing and shipping address took me in a big circle). I may not be the most tech savvy person so have a little extra patience to figure things out, but would have preferred just dealing with a person. Figured it out and made the purchase, overall not a big deal. I did like that I could look at the cart while checking out without navigating to a different page and restarting the process. This is the 2nd AP 362 we are buying, the first  one is on the fritz and hopefully with a new backup in good shape we can get the first one in good working order again!

Review.Titre: only holds 20 cd's
Review.Contenu: The ordering process was fine,no problems there.But I'm just not satisfied with the Bravo se-3.I purchased it to replace my Bravo II printer/burner.The quantity that the new machine holds is the only problem.

Review.Titre: You should reward your customers with…
Review.Contenu: You should reward your customers with discounts on labels, ink instead of ONLY new printers. it's disrespectful and I'm looking at other options. I'm tired of your set up!

Review.Titre: Online support not that great
Review.Contenu: Online support not that great.  When the printer works, it works, when you get a label jam, be prepared to spend an hour trying to get it out, then sending printer back to Primera for repair.

Review.Titre: No instructions provided
Review.Contenu: No instructions provided. The part was well-priced, easy to order, and shipped promptly, but no instructions were available anywhere on exactly how to remove the broken part and install the new one.

Review.Titre: site still not easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: site still not easy to navigate, and the printer cartridges I order do not seem to last a long time and they dry out quickly.  I wish they worked longer

Review.Titre: Ordering custom labels online is…
Review.Contenu: Ordering custom labels online is tedious and interface is somewhat unclear. No provision for re-ordering a previously ordered item.

Review.Titre: NEW WEB SITE IS MORE DIFFICULT TO FIND…
Review.Contenu: NEW WEB SITE IS MORE DIFFICULT TO FIND WHERE TO PURCHASE REFILLS FOR LABELS.  COULD NOT LOCATE BOX TO IMPUT PART NUMBER .  HAD TO SCROLL ALL THE WAY TO BOTTOM TO FIND FINNALLY ORDERING SUPPLIES TAB..

Review.Titre: Oversll a great store
Review.Contenu: Oversll a great store. Checkout procedure had a button that did not wok. Had to call them to complete tha sale.

Review.Titre: Good communication - bad terms.
Review.Contenu: Good communication, but ordering can be difficult due to minimum yearly spend to qualify for terms. Therefore, credit cards must be used if your company falls below that threshold.

Review.Titre: Costly Non Repair
Review.Contenu: While the person I chatted with made several attempts to solve my problem, the suggestion then was to return my unit for repairs.  After $ 450.00 to Primera and another $ 65.85 to ship the unit, they returned the unit with a new print head.  The unit worked and had been returned with ink cartridges that they had installed.  I then tried my original black ink cartridge again.  I got the same "ink cartridge not installed properly" message.  After a couple times back and forth with their replacement and my original cartridge, the real problem was evident.  My ink cartridge (yes, it's an original Primera cartridge and not an aftermarket one) was the problem all along.  I would think they woud have had similar problems in the past and could have suggested the source of the problem, thus saving me close to $ 500.00.

Review.Titre: Custom Label Size Service
Review.Contenu: The service of ordering customed size and material labels should be available to any country ! Why only USA ?

Review.Titre: The machine doesn't perform properly…
Review.Contenu: The machine doesn't perform properly all the time You have to setup frequently.it is tedious job.you loose production and Labels. That increase the cost.

Review.Titre: Niche product that is not as good as the purchase price would suggest
Review.Contenu: I have had multiple Primera products over the years. Their products are mostly in a niche that no other company is competing with. This means, in part, that they are not motivated to have their products work as smoothly, or with the refinement, that one might normally expect. It also seems likely that their sales quantity is lower than would be normal for most other equipment. All this seems to result in a less refined product at a higher price, but if you need this kind of product you don't have much other choice. My biggest issues are inconsistent technical support when problems arise, glitchy and/or under-refined printer drivers and/or application software, high cost of expendables, high purchase prices, and the fact that they don't make their own print engines and are thus at the mercy of the print engine manufacturer when it comes to availability and price of ink.

Review.Titre: Customer service/tech issues
Review.Contenu: Customer service/tech issues. Purcashes have been fine, but I still keep getting into hiccups with returns and getting help in customer service aspect.

Review.Titre: I needed an ink cartridge overnight
Review.Contenu: I needed an ink cartridge overnight, and the web site indicated that if I ordered by a 2pm, that it would ship same day...a Saturday. Great! I thought...except it didn't ship until Monday. Gotta fix that weekend verbiage.

Review.Titre: It would have been a 5-star review…but
Review.Contenu: It would have been a 5-star review had it not been for one experience with tech support. My initial experience was great and they pointed me in the direction I needed. Once I purchased my product, there were technical issues and using the chat tech support the website suggested was infuriating. The person was of NO help, simply telling me to keep reading the manual. My faith in them was renewed when my frustrations were addressed by a supervisor and followed up with a second round of help with a phone number and person talking through the issues. They were able to connect through my computer and took the time needed to correct the issue.

Review.Titre: Payment options need revision
Review.Contenu: The repair process is fairly easy. Payment options need to be revised. Many companies prefer to use purchase orders. In our case, we had to put the payment on a personal credit card to get our repair done and then ask for re-imbursement.

Review.Titre: Customer Service needs improvement
Review.Contenu: Have bought labels and ink for many years.  In the past customer service has been great but my past order I made a mistake and ordered the wrong size labels.  Reached out through chat and was told to send an email.  I sent an email on two different occasions to see if I could send the product back and just get a refund or store credit for future use and have not received any responses which is disappointing. It was my mistake ordering the wrong size so I can not be upset with them for that but not responding to a customer even if they were not able to accept the return is my complaint.UPDATE: After seeing this review I was notified that they assume the emails went to their spam folder and then created a ticket and sent a return label for those items to be sent back.  I would suggest maybe the spam folder to be checked if you are not seeing customer emails.  Regardless the situation is resolved.

Review.Titre: High Quality Printing Technology & Excellent Support
Review.Contenu: High quality product.  Timely delivery.  EXCELLENT support.  Leon, our FREE training Guide was fantastic.  Knowledgeable and answered all our questions.  Having past experience with edible printers and Photoshop, Leon curated his training to meet our needs.  Easy set up!  We were printing within 30 minutes of set up!  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Ink issues
Review.Contenu: We've been using Primera ink with our Bravo printer for many years and it's been fine. Our duplicator/printer is an older model, the Bravo se. Recently I noticed we were getting fewer disks printed per cartridge. Primera was quick to respond to my inquiries and after several emails, we discovered we were using an old style ink cartridge (the 53332) that does indeed have less ink in it. At Primera's urging, we switched to the 53334 cartridge and now we get significantly more disks printed per cartridge. Primera even sent me a free sample and a new "wiper" to help clean cartridges.

Review.Titre: I’m still learning how to use the Eddie…
Review.Contenu: I’m still learning how to use the Eddie printer, but so far it’s great. I’m pretty much teaching myself through YouTube videos. They offer a training session with the purchase of the printer but my trainer was terrible. He RUSHED through the steps (absolutely making it impossible to write anything down) and spent the remaining time pushing me to buy third party accessories. The machine itself is great, but the training session with useless.

Review.Titre: Primera Tech's are AWESOME
Review.Contenu: Overall, the customer service is amazing and helpful.  There was only one time where it was questionable and that was when someone put in very little effort resolving a problem that I had less that 24 hrs before which was quickly resolved the previous time. That unhelpful person told me I would need to send in my machine.  I ended up fixing the problem myself.  BUT - again, the customer service tech helper people are AMAZING and so helpful - especially in a pinch!

Review.Titre: The delivery is quick and what we…
Review.Contenu: The delivery is quick and what we receive is always what we ordered!

Review.Titre: Lx610 is fantastic
Review.Contenu: Lx610 arrived on time and undamaged. Had it up and printing contour cut stickers quick. Had a small issue with printing but it was my error. I'm loving it and hopeful to get some wholesale customers. I'd recommend more choices for material life holographic Rolls!

Review.Titre: The website would not process my order…
Review.Contenu: The website would not process my order for some reason. I tried many times. That is why 4 stars. The customer service chat got it done for me though.

Review.Titre: We tried to get to refurbished one
Review.Contenu: We tried to get to refurbished one. It took us a few steps to locate it.We had difficulty getting help to find the directions to center the labelling process.

Review.Titre: Real people - The best
Review.Contenu: I appreciate talking to real people in the chat instead of a robot.  The staff answered all my questions and my product arrived super fast.

Review.Titre: Website organization
Review.Contenu: Website organized in a way that made it easy to find what I was looking for.  Visually appealing and easy to locate products.

Review.Titre: Ordering
Review.Contenu: Had a little trouble understanding the person that took my order.Another lady came on the phone and got everything straight. I was ordering a replacement part.

Review.Titre: Excellent service
Review.Contenu: I purchased a printer that didn't fully meet my needs.  Customer service helped me order the right printer and allowed me to return the original printer.

Review.Titre: Feedback on primera photo printer and…
Review.Contenu: I bought the primera photo printer and bought the additional part so I can tint right from my photo phone wirelessly without a laptop. I think if it had instructions it would be way better. The printer says stop, hook up to a computer first. So it is contradictory info. I YouTubed it and it still is not perfect. How will I know when my ink is low? And it does not print as quickly as advertised. There is a big pause between printing. It is better than the cheap small air printer for sure, but for the cost, it should be turn key easy. Plus it did not come with paper or ink. I mean I bought that and refills, but it should honestly have a starter checklist or something. So to improve: getting started what to buy if printing from computer or phone. And a way to talk to the phone to check ink levels or thst the paper is loose. The paper comes loose and it prints anyway!!! I have to open it and it happened mid printing without moving it too. I hear the printer going bit no prints!!! Also, please sell an inexpensive carrying case for it.

Review.Titre: good experience!
Review.Contenu: Always have a good experience with Primera. TEC support is great and thus far have had a good experience with customers service.  Highly recommend 😁

Review.Titre: Your website makes it easy to reorder
Review.Contenu: Your website makes it easy to reorder, but the shipments have not been as timely as they used to be. I am now waiting a week for delivery when it used to be 3-4 days. Other than that, everything is great!

Review.Titre: Great company to work with
Review.Contenu: I find Primera an excellent company to work with. They have products in stock, and ship quickly. Thank you for being efficient and reliable.

Review.Titre: i would like to see the setting up the…
Review.Contenu: i would like to see the setting up the repair was more streamlined and less time consuming. The repair was very quick (thank you) .

Review.Titre: listening to customers a top priority…loyalty
Review.Contenu: listening to customers a top priority across the business.Management is good and overall work easier than other platforms

Review.Titre: I have had a great experience with…
Review.Contenu: I have had a great experience with using the Eddy but never received my free hour demonstration.

Review.Titre: Good information on what I needed to…
Review.Contenu: Good information on what I needed to fix the IP 60 printer issues

Review.Titre: No issues is good
Review.Contenu: It is just good when there are not issues to complicate ones day.

Review.Titre: Website
Review.Contenu: I bought it from your website at your regular price.

Review.Titre: No Comment at this time.
Not getting usable results with dvd-r’s
Review.Contenu: I am changing my review to 4 stars because Primera reached out and sent me new dvds overnight, however they are still printing very grainy, splotchy, and with a lot of ink on the surface which comes off on my fingers. I cannot use the dvds and will go back to Verbatim inkjet printable a which are half the cost and have always worked fine. I’m bummed that these didn’t work out and I have to now wait for the Verbatims to arrive to finish my project, but I appreciate Patrick and others reaching out to me and trying to make it right. The first person I spoke to, Kim, just kept saying I have the settings wrong etc and I didn’t really appreciate how they were corresponding with me, but Patrick and others have been great. My primera se-3 is awesome, will just use Verbatim discs from here on out.

Review.Titre: super fast turnaround…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the super fast turnaround time. Only the $300 charge is a bit hefty. I paid $15 for shipping. I cannot imagine it cost more for returning the printer. This is $285 for checking a paper sensor error that occurred after updating firmware.

Review.Titre: quailty
Review.Contenu: perfect company, 1st quality, fair prices

Review.Titre: Wonderfully knowledgable company to…
Review.Contenu: Wonderfully knowledgable company to work with !

Review.Titre: helpful
Review.Contenu: helpful, had what I needed and I ordered.  As an addendum.. I arrived quickly

Review.Titre: High Print Quality, Some Mechanical Issues
Review.Contenu: In general the printer works well. There are some mechanical/controls problems with ours and causes the print head to slam all the way to the right, then you have to hit several buttons for it to keep printing. Sometimes the feeder arm goes back too far into the printer and gets stuck. The print quality is great and easy to upload designs.  We are concerned for the price with the glitches that this printer will last our small business.

Review.Titre: It is always easy to order what I need…
Review.Contenu: It is always easy to order what I need because I have an account.  But I have to order custom labels since the ones I used to order have been discontinued and it will not allow me to just reorder my previous order.  I have to go in and select all the details every time I order.  It is just a nuisance.

Review.Titre: It would be nice to have some coupons…
Review.Contenu: It would be nice to have some coupons to save on orders once in a

Review.Titre: Update: They are resolving the printer issues quickly
Review.Contenu: Update/Edit:So afterward, they contacted me to resolve the issue I was encountering. They sent me the printer part that is believed to be the issue with the printer. Changing the part did not solve the issue, but the rep (Mark) allowed to take the printer for repair at no charge. Good customer service.

Review.Titre: I have to be honest
Review.Contenu: I have to be honest.  I have ordered several things from Primera this month and I am not sure which purchase this review is asking about.  But, for the most part, I like and trust Primera and its products.  You guys screwed up a custom label order but you are fixing it.  As long Primera continues to find a place to "fit" within Browne Trading co, they will be used.  thanks

Review.Titre: Great printer, except.....
Review.Contenu: The printer itself, and the tech support we received, are excellent. The really cool function is the die cut feature. The reason we didn't give the 5th star was the software that came with the package we bought. I thought I was opening a Windows 98 program. It's clunky and, at times, difficult to navigate. That being said, I've managed to work with it enough to figure things out, but it took a lot of extra time in my busy schedule that I wish that I didn't have to. Overall, it's a great product.

Review.Titre: They handled it quite well
Review.Contenu: They handled it quite well. They promised to ship new printer overnight on Monday but shipped it ground on Wednesday. I am happy it’s finally here but lost some business for getting it late. Nobody called me to warn about the change in delivery.

Review.Titre: Update your youtube page with more…
Review.Contenu: Update your youtube page with more helpful hints when working with the LX3000. Most of your videos are for older models and it would help seeing the actual machine im working on.

Review.Titre: Eddie Review
Review.Contenu: Training went ok but was hard to understand his voice.  Could have been our phone connection.  I was having trouble installing bartender but he logged into my computer and got the job done.  Thank you!  I am loving my Eddie so far.  Lots more to learn in Bartender ❤️Highly recommend this product!

Review.Titre: repairs are always done well
Review.Contenu: repairs are always done well The only downside of primera is there is no support and if the printer needs mechanical repairs, you need to send it to them but with a quick turnaround not so bad. Very reliable printer

Review.Titre: Quality and dependable, but… not cheap.
Review.Contenu: Quality dependable equipment and supplies. The price per label is comparable to buying rolls it would be nice if it actually saved $ printing in house. Ultimately there is little cost savings per label however you can print whatever labels you need when you need them.Savings come into effect on short run prints and avoiding MOQ on rolls for new products or seasonal products. The website interface could use a face lift.Client sign in and user dashboard, drop down menu could use an update for ease of use on mobil devices.

Review.Titre: First Time Purchase
Review.Contenu: Customer service is wonderful. As many questions asked and answered except for one. My order stayed on backorder status even though the representative stated it would ship in a couple of days. Maybe it’s the system not updating properly. Other than the system miss-communication, so far a good experience.

Review.Titre: I found my experience with dealing…
Review.Contenu: I found my experience with dealing Primera Associates was very productive and I received my machine as soon as it was available. I'm looking forward to more future business through Primera in the future and I thank you for your professionalism. If it is all it all possible could you possibly send to my address some address stickers so as I might send a machine to be refurbished. Thank you very much and have a very good day.Jeff Pyatt owner/ operator, rattle on records c e o.

Review.Titre: I was hoping to get my LX800 printer…
Review.Contenu: I was hoping to get my LX800 printer fixed to continue using, but it is no longer being serviced, so I had to buy another Primera. I now have an LX900 and am happy with it. I had several questions while setting it up, and the customer service thru live chat was a nice option. They were helpful and I was able to get it up and running.

Review.Titre: The person who assisted me was very…
Review.Contenu: The person who assisted me was very helpful.  But I wouldn't even need help if you would post online what dies you already have for custom label printing.  I also wish there were more options in non-custom labels for my LX500.  I love my LX500 by the way!  Perfect for my small business.

Review.Titre: Great product and service
Review.Contenu: The AP360 is a great product that has helped us immensely in streamlining our process and delivering a better looking crowler to our customers. After a year and a half of fairly heavy use one of the roller motors gave out. Customer service was extremely helpful in setting up a service ticket and walking us through purchasing a new machine. The new machine arrived very quickly, and the old one was fixed in a matter of days! Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: i called bc eddie was acting up
Review.Contenu: i called bc eddie was acting up. not fully printing a cookie and stopping midstream. after the call with tech, eddie continues to do the same thing. i had to finish cookies this weekend by drawing by hand to complete pictures

Review.Titre: Pleasurable experience
Review.Contenu: Great company thus far,  support is some of the best around.  Very helpful each time I’ve needed them the 1st few weeks.  Some issues haven’t been addressed to my satisfaction thus far but it’s a work in progress for sure.  Overall,  very happy with my experience dealing with primera.  Highly recommended

Review.Titre: Support slow this time, but everything works
Review.Contenu: I experienced some delays with my support ticket, but they did respond eventually and matters have since been resolved.Primera supplies good equipment (although ink cartridges sometimes clog), and have in the past had good support.  They are honest, and hopefully in the future support will come easier.

Review.Titre: As a canadian customer
Review.Contenu: As a canadian customer, I need to use the website to place my order. I had to redo it numerous time to get through, this i why I am giving only 4 stars. On the other hand, I had the assistance of the sales teams on the chat and they are very helpfull, well trained, polite and quick. The search engine is very well done and efficient. I would have give them 6 stars if the option was available. Thanks in particular Kelli and Kate.

Review.Titre: The site was fairly easy to maneuver!
Review.Contenu: The site was fairly easy to maneuver!! Right up front the site tells you the lag time for delivery is 4-6 weeks, so this should be again stated in delivery options. If I pay overnight delivery am I REALLY going to get it tomorrow if they are running 4-6 weeks behind?  It shouldn’t even be an option. Second, my billing and shipping address are NOT the same but every time I tried to change one the other would automatically change. Little annoying glitches.  The rest of the site was great

Review.Titre: A little Clunky
Review.Contenu: I had to create an account to order. Then I logged out, then logged back in to place another order and it would not let me. Why?When placing my order I have a different billing and shipping address. To get it to work I had to type both in several times. I am not confident the info will be saved correctly for my next order.

Review.Titre: I love the concept of printing directly…
Review.Contenu: I love the concept of printing directly onto my cookies.  There was a steep learning curve, many misprints which, hopefully have been remedied by the recent update.  Customer service is the best!  Friendly, knowlegable and patient.

Review.Titre: Easy enough to set
Review.Contenu: Easy enough to set up with the included instruction manual. Only running single (front) labels right now, but will eventually be adding a second (back) label. Much quicker than hand labeling. Only issue is that there is one corner of the label that does not get pressed on, but a simple swipe of the hand over the label as the bottle is put in its case solves the problem. Will play with the settings some more to see if I can fix it in the future.

Review.Titre: The website is not the easiest to…
Review.Contenu: The website is not the easiest to navigate.  Could be set up a little different, example.. I am purchasing dye based ink, did a search and the pigment based printhead came up when I searched for printhead. I had it in my cart and remembered that there were options.  Should have been first option.  It did not come up until I retyped in printhead

Review.Titre: Good reliable printers, I'm on my second one in 7 years.
Review.Contenu: My trusty LX400 label printer died yesterday and a rep reached out to me via the chat feature. She told me that I could get a credit for my old printer towards a new one, which will be here Friday. A new printer was a big hit for a small business like mine, but was necessary. These are good reliable printers.

Review.Titre: I needed immediate feedback
Review.Contenu: I needed immediate feedback. Went to the support page and obediently filled out the "Submit a ticket" tech support form. In the past, this method has worked quickly to reach an actual human, but not so this time. The day wore on... eventually I gave in to impatience and used the live chat box support. Was able to get the problem sorted on the spot! RE: talking -vs- live chat: Why no 800 number?

Review.Titre: I have issues with a company that can…
Review.Contenu: I have issues with a company that can decide who their real customers are. Drop shipping to a reseller’s customer With Primera part #, address, telephone# splashed all over their product is unethical. For a 10% discount on the first order to ADC, they now have paid a small price for a live lead.Previous ADC Buyers let that happen, but no longer!

Review.Titre: It took me open an account to pay an…
Review.Contenu: It took me open an account to pay an RMA to find out that I could not lay on your web site because I am in Canada and ended up call your office.  it would have been nice to let me know up front payment from Canada cannot be done online and I would have called right away.

Review.Titre: Third Times A Charm
Review.Contenu: I was a little disappointed in the quality of the product. I had to swap out a brand new printer twice before I received a third one that worked properly. However, the company was very good at getting replacements sent out in a timely manner.  My assumption is that they had a bad run of printers. I guess that  can happen to any company.  Once I received a good printer, it worked perfectly.

Review.Titre: Difficult
Review.Contenu: I am finding it difficult to do, since I am not computer literate, but I will still continue to try.  Your assistance employees are top notch.  They try to explain in laymans terms how to do things.  When I am doing very simple pictures they are great.  Thank you

Review.Titre: Nice printer but website lacks product help and support.
Review.Contenu: Had troubles initially setting this printer up.  Customer support was helpful but I would like if they had more tech support information right on their website.  It's not always convenient to have to chat, call or wait for a reply email - would much rather just go to a support section and get the info I need to start using this printer and the BarTender software.

Review.Titre: Though I think everyone's toner…
Review.Contenu: Though I think everyone's toner cartridges are way over-priced, it would be an economical option if Primera offered a 3-color package (i.e. without the black) so that a little money can be saved. I find on my labels black doesn't run out as fast, so for me to keep purchasing the 4 packs only leads to stock-piled black toner.

Review.Titre: Package arrived 4 days late.
Review.Contenu: My package was suppose to be delivered  Monday. FedEx said I wasn't home and I was. They said it would be delivered Tuesday. It wasn't delivered Tuesday. They said it would be delivered Wednesday and it wasn't delivered. I called FedEx twice and both times after speaking to them I was disconnected.

Review.Titre: I ordered a printhead for a 4100…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a printhead for a 4100 Autoprinter. It worked well. I gave 4 stars because I ordered one in the past that didn't work at all and I couldn't get a replacement. I will never forget that experience. I continue to order from here just because it's easier and I only had that one poor experience. Not enough to write them off completely. I've used them a lot over the years and for the most part it's been a good experience.

Review.Titre: Easy to deal with mostly
Review.Contenu: Easy to deal with mostly. SE-3 AutoPrinter worked right out of the box, instructions were clear, installation was a snap on my MacPro. Calibration was confusing as some instruction like “align printer” button should be pressed, but there wasn’t a button with that name so I clicked on two of the buttons. There was a slight bit of skipping on the smaller font, not bad, just didn’t notice that on the older Bravo. Overall would use this company and am content with my purchase.

Review.Titre: We had some problems trying to pay the…
Review.Contenu: We had some problems trying to pay the P/O yesterday. We don't know the reason for it, but it was in the Primera.com page link. Today we were able to place, pay and sent the P/O for our items. Thank you

Review.Titre: The order arrived on time
Review.Contenu: The order arrived on time. These are obviously crazy prices for simple paper labels and ink, but if they are able to get it, I guess it's the free market. On the other hand, when a product become too expensive, the customer starts to search for alternate solutions e.g. farming the jobs out to production printers.

Review.Titre: This review is for the Eddie
Review.Contenu: This review is for the Eddie, Edible printer. It is an amazing machine and once you read the manual,  do the training and learn to use it it's awesome! There's so much you can do with it. The only reason for the 4 (and not 5) star review is it is glitchy.  It may stop partway through a print. It is not something you can set and walk away from. I have yet to call customer service because I have figured it out on my own - which usually consists of pressing the load or pause buttons or turn it off and back on again. I hear customer service is responsive and very good!We do find the Eddie a wonderful addition to our business and would consider purchasing another one!

Review.Titre: Customer Service was excellent however
Review.Contenu: Customer Service was excellent however, the product came with frustrations.  After about a month of troubleshooting my wife feels more confident in using it.  It has not been a smooth process although the customer service was 5 star.

Review.Titre: The Little engine that Could
Review.Contenu: Overall, leaning toward 5-stars. However, the printers are very finicky and can be very frustrating to fine tune. Rolls are a little higher than competitors (paper companies, BOPP, etc.) but they're always good quality. I'd certainly recommend Primera products still.

Review.Titre: Great labels, fast delivery
Review.Contenu: I've used these labels for years. I get the 4x6 gloss labels. They used to be perforated all the time, but they took that away saying they were getting jams on machines. We never had any jamming and now have to do a special order to get the same labels at an additional cost. If it wasn't for that I'd given it 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Service process was easy and efficient
Review.Contenu: Service process was easy and efficient. I do wish that they would be able to ship us out an appropriate sized box and proper packaging, especially for the cost of repair. Never-the-less, we shipped it out of here with a bunch of bubble wrap, and it must of arrived safe.

Review.Titre: Nice help on CHAT
Review.Contenu: I used the chat option a couple of times before ordering and everyone was very helpful. My only complaint? While placing my order, it would not let me get past the address line because I do not have a second address line... so I had to use my street address twice.  Hope it gets here ok!

Review.Titre: The warranty stuff is kind of…
Review.Contenu: The warranty stuff is kind of confusing. No instruction on how to get it matched with the printer we just bought so had to go through emails to ask, quite a few emails. The label printer is awesome and the quality is good. Like the pro software very easy to use. Overall is a good experience.

Review.Titre: Foam Roller
Review.Contenu: The product that I ordered came in a timely fashion and was in great condition. My only complaint was that I needed two rollers as they sit side-by-side on my machine, and I did not see anywhere on the description that they were sold singly.

Review.Titre: Only reason its a 4 star and not 5 is…
Review.Contenu: Only reason its a 4 star and not 5 is because when I clicked on "Buy more ink" on the printers software it brought me to a 404 page and I had to manually find the ink. Not the end of the world just wanted to bring that to you attention! Cheers.

Review.Titre: great service
Review.Contenu: Great service very helpful, efficient and patient. I saw on the internet first time buyers were entitled to a saving of 10% if purchase on-line if they enter code SAVE10. Sales person and web site did not make this option available. I was disappointed.

Review.Titre: way to go to provide updates
Review.Contenu: it was difficult finding my product since it has been updated with new ones... but it was great the company reached out with an explanation which I appreciated.I like a responsible response company and will continue to use their great products.

Review.Titre: Have always had good luck and very…
Review.Contenu: Have always had good luck and very satisfied.  However, when cut off is at 2 p.m. and I order at 1;45 and schedule and pay for next day shipping, it takes 2 days to get here.  Order is not packaged that same day.This has happened twice

Review.Titre: HUGE purchase for me but....
Review.Contenu: HUGE purchase for me, I bit the bullet and bought the LX500 I have to say finally my labels match the quality of my products. I have leveled up, my clients love the look, I am getting more inquiries for wholesale, and advertising requests! I am so glad I took a chance, I already see it paying off. The LX500 works fine with great with Adobe Illustrator and my Macbook Pro, with an usb adapter of course. Karen in sales- went above and beyond for me!  Any issues I have had I was able to iron out with Primera support. I only wish support was 24/7!!! Thank you Primera!

Review.Titre: I like the out of warranty repair…
Review.Contenu: I like the out of warranty repair option.  However, shipping the unit back was rather complicated as we didn't have the original packaging so luckily we had a location shipping company to assist.  Repairs were performed quickly and the unit returned in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: The ordering process is very glitchy
Review.Contenu: The ordering process is very glitchy. When you're in your cart and you need to make edits, it's very slow and doesn't always save changes. This has been happening ever since I've ordered from PRIMERA.

Review.Titre: Most Primera CS people are wonderful except.....
Review.Contenu: Most CS people are wonderful at Primera. When I get Janiel, I normally hang up or disconnect the chat since he seems to prefer to drag out the correction process rather than jumping in to assist a busy office environment. Today I tried to work with Janiel. Wasted time! It would have been better to disconnect the chat and start fresh with someone who is actually interested in delivering customer service. We keep a copy of his chats and tape them to the wall near our Primera printers as a reminder for all staff that when they get Janiel, hang up or disconnect and get someone else! To be fair to the rest of the kind team at Primera, I will give a 4 star but for Janiel, I would give a zero.

Review.Titre: The Primera products we are purchasing…
Review.Contenu: The Primera products we are purchasing are for resale to our customers.  Our quotes to our customers and operating cost promotions are based on our costs.  The inkjet cartridge prices on our order were 27% more than the quoted prices.

Review.Titre: Fast shipping.
Review.Contenu: Web platform was clean and easy to navigate. Shipping time was fast. Shipping prices were relatively low for next-day priority. Would have been 5 stars if the customer service team had been a little bit more knowledgeable about product.

Review.Titre: Everything has always been pretty…
Review.Contenu: Everything has always been pretty smooth, but Primera should add a tab on the actual product of the printer paper and ink that is supported by it.  Seems more difficult to get to the paper we need for the LX500c.

Review.Titre: I wasn’t able to check out on the site
Review.Contenu: I wasn’t able to check out on the site. The billing and shipping addresses are different, and I indicated it as such, and was unable to complete my purchase. I spent over 20 minutes on this. When I checked the box that both addresses were the same (they are not), I was able to check out, and complete my purchase. Please correct this. This is not the first time that I’ve had trouble on your site.UPDATED REVIEW:Thank you for your response. I’ve ordered from the site since my last review. I’ve been able to check out by just checking the box, indicating that the shipping and billing addresses are the same. I won’t fault the company, since this is an issue that they can’t control.

Review.Titre: I love the print cartridges but they do…
Review.Contenu: I love the print cartridges but they do not last very long once they are put in the machine.  We don't reproduce DVD's as often as we used to and I wind up throwing the cartridges away even though they show full on the system.

Review.Titre: some direction
Review.Contenu: It would’ve been a five star rating if there would’ve been some direction on how to line up the postcard material as I wasted about 15 postcards getting the correct line up so it would print on each post card and not bleed over to the next

Review.Titre: Took me a few tries to navigate the…
Review.Contenu: Took me a few tries to navigate the site but lo and behold managed to place my order after accidentally deleting and then not being able to find my items. Felt a tad challenged but in the end mission accomplished.

Review.Titre: Communication Issues
Review.Contenu: Ordering was easy, however no one notified us to let us know that our card was declined due to fraud. We received a shipping notification with tracking and finally had to call to see why the printer hadn’t moved. Come to find out it was still sitting at Primera. After speaking with customer service, we completed our charge, the printer was shipped and received within 3 days. 2 days later however, we received an email from customer service that they needed a new card number to run through because the first one was declined. I politely emailed back to let them know we had already received our printer and it was already being used.I know communication can fail sometimes but I feel this could be better. We are loving our Eddie and are pleased with the purchase!

Review.Titre: Bravo number 4
Review.Contenu: This my 4th Bravo disc publisher. All have been very good work horses. My only issue with the new SE3 is that even when powered down, there are two blue LEDs that continue to shine. One bright and steady, the other bright and flashing.

Review.Titre: I love their label printer and the ink…
Review.Contenu: I love their label printer and the ink works great, however, I do not think over $10 in shipping is necessary for one little 2 1/4" x 1/2" cartridge.

Review.Titre: Products are delivered quickly and…
Review.Contenu: Products are delivered quickly and accurately.  The quality of the ink cartridges is not great. I have received several that are dried up or have very low yields.

Review.Titre: We had some issues with the software…
Review.Contenu: We had some issues with the software not loading correctly and it took a couple of hours on the phone to get it resolved, but the service on that issue was good too, and once it was resolved, the product works very well.

Review.Titre: When the printer arrived
Review.Contenu: When the printer arrived, the power cord was not included, but after emailing Primera, they were prompt in apologizing and FedExing a power cord. The unit had a new print head unit, but it would have been helpful to have a page of diagram instructions. I forgot that the carriage assembly had to be popped open before the print head could be inserted. Then the PTPublisher would not recognize the repaired printer even after rebooting the computer and changing cables. An email to tech support was answered by phone soon and, after eventually getting the remote control application to work, tech support cleared the problem. But the instructions that solved the connection problem could have been included on an instruction page...

Review.Titre: pleasant experience
Review.Contenu: My experience with the rep was very pleasant. However, I took a star away because I shouldn't have had to call in the first place. I understand that kinks are still being worked out on the website.

Review.Titre: Lots of help!!!!
Review.Contenu: All the information that you’ve given me, as well as how to get started with different programs. The videos to help get started are so helpful!

Review.Titre: Excellent Service
Review.Contenu: When I placed my order, it was processed and shipped extremely quickly! I also received communication on how to access the manual and links to training videos in advance, which is great!

Review.Titre: Pat my sales person was great I had…
Review.Contenu: Pat my sales person was great I had trouble with PayPal and he helped me through the whole buying process Thank you Pat S!!👍

Review.Titre: Fast shipping and expert customer service.
Review.Contenu: Primera has always been an incredible business to work with. Their customer support team is extremely knowledgeable and when I’m out of cartridges and order early enough in the day they literally send out a shipment notice within minutes. Their products have grown my company over the last three years. Thank you Primera!

Review.Titre: My virtual training went very well
Review.Contenu: My virtual training went very well. I appreciate my trainer's patience and knowledge of the product and it's functions.

Review.Titre: The best!
Review.Contenu: The tech was helpful, explained everything so I can understand it and was patient.

Review.Titre: The best I have experienced
Review.Contenu: The best I have experienced!  Spent an hour with me on the phone trying to trouble shoot my machine.  After running test and determining the machine need technical repair they made it easy to send in and effortless on payment and return.  6 stars!

Review.Titre: Reasons for 5 stars:Impressive Service!
Review.Contenu: Reasons for 5 stars:*quickly connected with a tech service person*He was very knowledgeable about my problem* Very patient and easy to understand his instructions* Spent over an hour walking me through the steps to    rectify my issue* Super impressive support department!

Review.Titre: Needed Labels
Review.Contenu: Needed to order labels but the one I need is not a normal stock item. A custom label takes too much time but the Sales Chat advised two preferred vendors where I could get them. So, I ordered stock labels from Primera as cheaper and the others I needed from their preferred vendor. All good.

Review.Titre: Excellent service
Review.Contenu: Excellent service, speedy shipping!We were replacing an existing Primera Disk Publisher that was put through its paces and was ready for retirement. The new one arrived very quickly and the service throughout was fantastic.Thanks!

Review.Titre: As a small business owner
Review.Contenu: As a small business owner, we rely on and appreciate our suppliers and vendors who support us with equipment setup,  maintenance and troubleshooting issues. Primera's technical team has been outstanding in thier level of service; knowledge of our printer's features, functions and processes. The Facebook group is responsive and shares useful information about specific industry issues and solutions. Primera attends and participates in industry events offering participants an opportunity to see their equipment in action and meet/speak to company representatives. We saved up to purchase our Eddie printer and it is one of the best decisions we've ever made.  Having Eddie is almost like having an employee.... without the payroll increase! No vacation or sick days, lunch breaks or holiday time off for Eddie! Everyone here at Happy Day Creations loves our Eddie printer and the Primera team for helping us achieve our sales goals and keeping our customers happy!

Review.Titre: Kelli is amazing and is the best…
Review.Contenu: Kelli is amazing and is the best Customer Service Rep EVER !!  We've been working with her for 4 years now and we love her !! She is the BEST !!The Cajun Turkey CompanyBilly Howell

Review.Titre: Real Service Not Typical Automation
Review.Contenu: I think customer service with this company is great because they have people handling business. Automated systems are the downfall of exceptional customer connections. The expectation of todays service is to wait on hold, and talk to an automated voice. Primera doesn't do this to customers and this is a reason for success.

Review.Titre: FAST AND EASY ORDERING
Review.Contenu: FAST AND EASY ORDERING, PROMPT SHIPPING.

Review.Contenu: I love my Eddie so much. Thank you so much for helping this cookier’s life so much easier.🤗

Review.Contenu: We were a little apprehensive about spending such a large sum of money on a device that will mainly be used for charitable activities. After the first printed cookie, we knew we made the right choice. What a fantastic printer. My wife loves it and has requests coming in already.

Review.Contenu: The customer service and quick shipping is beyond perfection! I deal with a lot of businesses with all the products that I purchase! Review.Contenu: Ordered Ink Cartridges - always before they have been shipped in a box - this time they were shipped in an envelope - one of the three was smashed when they arrived. When Primera found out they are going to replace the damaged cartridge - outstanding customer service,

Review.Titre: Customer service is great and very…
Review.Contenu: Customer service is great and very helpful. I went on the chat with customer service to ask questions, before and after I purchased the printer and got the answers to all. Also, with one on one training, highly recommended, Leon, the trainer was very helpful. During the training, there was an earthquake at where he was, but he returned with a calm manner and resumed with the training. He explained and covered all the basic of everything of how to operate the printer. I only have Eddie printer for about three weeks and am loving it. Still have a lot to learn, but he has been a great help with my cookie decoration. He makes certain job a whole lot easier and faster. If you have any question, get on the chat or call, customer service representatives are very helpful!

Review.Titre: The online ordering was easy
Review.Contenu: The online ordering was easy. Liked the custom labelformat.

Review.Titre: Had a great experience working with…
Review.Contenu: Had a great experience working with Chas! He made me feel my business needs were important and help me find the best solution for my process and budget.

Review.Titre: My printer fan was installed improperly…
Review.Contenu: My printer fan was installed improperly and causing frequent intervention from Primera Technicians. After several years, I shipped it to Primera for diagnostics. The repair costs were waved after I requested assistance from the RMA supervisor. To reimburse the shipping expense, I received ink cartridges at no cost.A fair and acceptable reimbursement. Everyone including Patrick Timmins was pleasant and most satisfactory!

Review.Titre: Chat help was EXCELLENT Ambar saved…
Review.Contenu: Chat help was EXCELLENT Ambar saved your sale!

Review.Titre: Customer service is fantastic!

I received a very thorough and helpful email response that really helped me to feel comfortable making such a large purchase and believing I will be able to make it work for my needs.

Review.Titre: After 5000 cookies printed
Review.Contenu: After two years we began expierencing platform feed obstruction errors. We contacted customer support and determined a repair was necessary.  Sent it in and had it returned looking brand new in just seven days.  It also came back with a new print cartridge!  Great job, very pleased.

Review.Titre: Broken gear
Review.Contenu: I had to return my printer due to a gear breaking during normal operation. It was fixed and returned promptly and I have had no other issues so far. Very expensive to ship, but it was still within the 1-year warranty for the repair. It was returned with a full ink cartridge which offset the shipping cost.

Review.Titre: Excellent service!
Review.Contenu: We ran out of ink during a huge project. My husband called and ordered some to be delivered the next morning. The representative also gave him some tips on how to make our ink last longer. We called back later in the day to order another cartridge and they canceled the original order and added the second with no additional shipping charges. Excellent customer service!

Review.Titre: Received a "cartridge unknown" message…
Review.Contenu: Received a "cartridge unknown" message on my Eddie cookie printer when icing lodged under the cartridge. The rep was very helpful with a couple of troubleshooting suggestions. When neither helped resolve the problem he thought it might be a cartridge problem so he said he would send out a complimentary cartridge on Monday which I received promptly on Tuesday. I was very pleased with the courtesy, efficiency promptness of the customer service rep. After putting in the new cartridge the problem was resolved. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Best Customer Support
Review.Contenu: Needed ink for an older model (LX810) that we use for backup and it was shipped right away which helps us avoid delays in our business. We appreciate Primera's attention to urgency and customer support.

Review.Titre: Excellent Customer Service!
Review.Contenu: I had called to place an order, then realized 15 minutes later that I ordered the wrong quantity.  I called back and it had already gone to shipping (fast!); however, the customer service rep reached out to them to see if it could be changed, and they did.  Very grateful!

Review.Titre: They are super fast
Review.Contenu: They are always so prompt!  Placed my order and within 10 minutes I had received my Confirmation/Invoice Copy/Notification that my product had shipped.  I have never had any trouble with any orders and they have always had a fast turn around.  Which is super great when you sometimes get told at the last minute that an item is needed to keep the production line rolling.

Review.Titre: I  have NEVER dealt with a company …
Review.Contenu: I  have NEVER dealt with a company  that has invested  so much time into their  customers. The customer  support  agent that  helped me stayed on the phone until my printer was working in top condition. He even took control  of my laptop to troubleshoot  shoot problem till it was right. It was a user error and no fault  with the printer but just the fact that he made sure everything  was right assured me that my purchase  was worth it.

Review.Contenu: Printer is printing perfectly again.  Did need to find contact for door closed as it had cracked off during shipping I guess.  I just bypassed it so the printer works with the door opened or closed.

Review.Contenu: We bought some used Primera machines. When I called in seeking support, I totally figured I would be paying for support. We were not, and support spent hours with us, setting these machines up and teaching us how they work. Their website has tons of written documentation, for these machines. I have yet to get a NO answer to any of my questions, only solutions. In our 35 years in business, we have never worked with a company as well managed. We will not hesitate to purchase more Primera equipment in the future.

Review.Titre: I am so glad I bought the LX 610
Review.Contenu: I am so glad I bought the LX 610. It has made packaging my products so much easier. Really good investment. Shipping is fast on label rolls and ink carts. Also the ink carts last a good long while. Printing quality is very professional.
